title: Productive Python and Django Development with PyCharm
summary: PyCharm is a new integrated development environment for Python and Django. During the talk we will show you how PyCharm can be used to find and correct coding errors in real-time, navigate and refactor complex project structures easily, and develop new code quickly and correctly.
